section.title: Exercise: Styling the widgets created by the life cycle class
Target
section.para: In this exercise you will ensure that the widget created by the life cycle handler of your application are also styled.

section.title: Implement styling
section.para: Change your Manager class to the following to one of your CSS files for the widgets created in this class.
